22.10.3 Predictive Modeling
Generally, the problem is a time series multiclass classiﬁcation problem. As we have seen, it
may also be framed as a binary classiﬁcation problem and a multi-step time series classiﬁcation
problem. The original paper explored the use of a classical machine learning algorithm on a
version of the dataset where features were engineered from each window of data. Speciﬁcally, a
modiﬁed support vector machine.
